txt.en: Watch-towers and heavy fortifications bar the road
The pass could prove a valuable route of attack for the Haban’akkâ
A deadly perch from which trolls bombard those below with boulders
Sárgo is in Zirakazhâr.\n\nYou should return to Sárgo.
'Excellent work, Hermáth. The information you gathered will be instrumental in planning our attacks upon the enemy.'
'I require your assistance again, friend. The scouts you rescued are recovering from their ordeal. While we wait for their return, we need help covering the other areas they were to inspect.'
The hills are crawling with the enemy
With Thrain's scouts recovering, their duties must be taken up by another.
The Orcs have taken over these ruins
Locations to be scouted can throughout Azanulbizar.\n\nSárgo Stiffbeard has asked you to take over the duties of the scouts that you rescued.
